attributes.action: send troublesome yobs into boot camp or 3 years in the army
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
any person between the age of 16 -- 26 found terrorising our streets, binge drinking, violence or public disorder to be immediatly located to a boot camp or 3 years in the armed forces. if person is found guilty of murder they should face the death penalty.
this needs to be done to reclaim back our streets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
